attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU resource limit allow  plain integer values with suffix m(milli) e.g 1000m, 100.

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limits is specified by number of bytes. Followed by quantity suffix like E,P,T,G,M,k and Ei,Pi,Ti,Mi,Gi,Ki can also be used. e.g 129e6, 129M,  128974848000m, 123Mi

attrs.label: Extra Host Path Volume Mounts
attrs.description: MUST have a corresponding Host Path Volume defined
